pkgmetadata.longdescription: Named Entity Recognition in Texts using 'NameTag' // Wraps the 'nametag' library https://github.com/ufal/nametag, allowing users to find and extract entities (names, persons, locations, addresses, ...) in raw text and build your own entity recognition models. Based on a maximum entropy Markov model which is described in Strakova J., Straka M. and Hajic J. (2013) http://ufal.mff.cuni.cz/~straka/papers/2013-tsd_ner.pdf.
